title: How to Make a Gate in Minecraft

steps.title: Gather four wooden planks.You can either collect planks from villages or craft them from a single wooden log.
steps.content: Gather four wooden planks.You can either collect planks from villages or craft them from a single wooden log . [1] X Research source You can build a gate from any type of wood.

steps.title: Open the crafting table.
steps.content: Open the crafting table. You can do so by right-clicking (PC) or pressing L2 or Z2 (console controller) the crafting table . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Craft two planks into sticks.
steps.content: Craft two planks into sticks. Here's how: [3] X Research source . Place one plank in the 2th square (the one at the top-center). Place another in the 5th square (right below the other plank). Drag the stick to the inventory.

steps.title: Place planks into the 5th and 8th squares.
steps.content: Place planks into the 5th and 8th squares. The 5th square is at the center of the grid. Place the second plank right beneath it (the 8th square).

steps.title: Place sticks in the 4th, 7th, 6th and 9th squares.
steps.content: Place sticks in the 4th, 7th, 6th and 9th squares. The planks must be surrounded by sticks on the right and left sides.

steps.title: Drag the gate to your inventory.
steps.content: Drag the gate to your inventory. Your gate is ready to be placed.

steps.title: Go to the part of the fence where you want to place the gate.
steps.content: Go to the part of the fence where you want to place the gate. Gates can also be attached to cobblestone walls. The gate must have a solid block beneath it (they can't be placed in mid-air).

steps.title: Select the gate in your hotbar.
steps.content: Select the gate in your hotbar. It's at the bottom of the screen. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Right-click the spot where you want to place the gate.
steps.content: Right-click the spot where you want to place the gate. If you're using a console, press L2 or Z2 . The gate is now placed. Gates can also be attached to cobblestone walls.

steps.title: Right-click the gate to open or close it.
steps.content: Right-click the gate to open or close it. Press L2 or Z2 if you're using a console system. Gates can be opened both inward and outward.
